input.sentences: i told these two lovers that i 'd catch a glorious photo of them by the time the party was over .
[male] was not about to make it an easy task | being as shy as he is .
we had a great time and everyone was dressed up in this damp building .
most of the building was still under construction | but we stayed in a mostly complete section of it .
i was n't able to get a good photo of the glorious couple | but i did catch [male] 's swagger on film .
output.sentences: A night out with some good friends.
The camera flash is burning their eyes!
Thankfully, the dark room helps them recover.
Some fresh air will definitely help.
Never mind, the camera is back!
